roleset.name: cause to expand, stagnant growth accompanied by inflation
roleset.note: INFLATE-V NOTES: No comparison. Member of Vncls other_cos-45.4. Checked by Julia, 10/2010. (from inflate.01-v)
STAGFLATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-5, stagnate.01, inflation.01. No VNcls. (from stagflation.01-n)
INFLATION-N NOTES: Updated by Julia. Member of Vncls Other_cos-45.4. (from inflation.01-n)

roles.note: I have no idea if start/end points are likely to occur. (from stagflation.01-n)

role.descr: amount increased by, EXT or MNR

example.name: straight transitive
example.text: MiniScribe has said that its financial results for the past three fiscal years would have to be restated because of the allegedly fraudulent accounting and marketing practices that *trace* inflated revenues and net income.
example.arg: that -> the allegedly fraudulent accounting and marketing practices

example.name: tricky EXT marker
example.text: That compared with the year-earlier $1.25 billion, or $2.10 a share -- which *trace*-1 was inflated *trace*-1 by an unspecified amount from a payment by Fujitsu Ltd. relating to a software dispute.
example.arg: which -> the year-earlier $1.25 billion, or $2.10 a share
by an unspecified amount from a payment by Fujitsu Ltd. relating to a software dispute

example.name: ergative, with args 1-4
example.text: My own student loan inflated over 320%, from $2500 to over $8000.

example.name: args 0, 2
example.text: Well, worst is a pretty big accomplishment because that would mean he surpassed Jimmy Carter and his stagflation of 15% unemployment and 15% inflation...

example.name: with TMP
example.text: The main point to Reagan 's economic legacy was finally killing the stagflation of the 1970's , anyways though

example.name: arg1
example.text: And as the war drags on, our economy's stagflation will be even more pronounced and the Federal Reserve will have to raise interest rates ...

example.name: physical inflation with end-state
example.text: Inflation of the balloon to different volumes

example.name: non-financial metaphorical inflation with end-state
example.text: his inflation of the notion of "passing" to encompass all forms of such surgery
example.arg: to encompass all forms of such surgery

example.name: with start and end states
example.text: its inflation from a few hundred nests in the 1970s (when the population was decimated by DDT use) to over 450,000 today
example.arg: from a few hundred nests in the 1970s (when the population was decimated by DDT use)

example.name: with arg2
example.text: ... outstripping both the initial 3 % inflation goal set by the government of Socialist Prime Minister...
